extracted-table.table-caption: Connections identified using ptau × ∆Time as a predictor for longitudinal changes in WaCSMD (multiple comparisons corrected using Bonferroni at 0.05) sorted by corresponding p-values (column 1–3), and the correlation between simple MD changes and ptau × ∆Time on the identified connections (column 4). Two ROIs (i.e., ROI 1 and ROI 2) represent one connection and the ROI indices corresponds to their labels in the IIT template.
